name: queryEach
description: Iterates over query rows and passes each row per iteration to a callback function

params.name: maxThreads
params.description:
Lucee4.5+ Maximum number of threads executed
If "parallel" argument is set to false it will be ignored

lucee.notes: When called as a member function query.each() is chainable.

examples.title: Iterate over query rows instead of cfloop()
examples.code: news = queryNew("id,title", "integer,varchar", [{ "id": 1, "title": "Dewey defeats Truman" }, { "id": 2, "title": "Man walks on Moon" }] ); function newsRow(row) { writeOutput(''); writeOutput('#row.id#') writeOutput('#row.title#'); writeOutput(''); } #queryEach(news,newsRow)#

links.title: Map, Reduce and other Higher Order Functions
links.description: A Primer for map, reduce, filter, and Higher Order Functions in general.

links.title: ColdFusion 11: .map() and .reduce()
links.description: A look at the new .map() and .reduce() methods that each of array, struct and lists all have
